results.title: Metformin: Expanding the Scope of Application:Starting Earlier than Yesterday, Canceling Later
results.text_hl: Today the area of application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is expanding, and a wealth of data point to its benefits in people without @<m>DISEASE_Carbohydrate_Metabolism_Inborn_Errors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002239 @@@carbohydrate metabolism disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Kononova YA, Likhonosov NP, Babenko AY. Metformin: Expanding the Scope of Application:Starting Earlier than Yesterday, Canceling Later Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Feb 21;23(4):. PMID: 35216477

results.title: Use of metformin in patients who require intravascular administration of a contrast agent.
results.text_hl: Many @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, due to complications of @<m>DISEASE_Carbohydrate_Metabolism_Inborn_Errors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002239 @@@carbohydrate metabolism disorders@@@, including @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular complications@@@ or other accompanying diseases, require cardiological or radiological diagnostics related to the administration of a contrast agent.

citations.NLM: Rokicka D, Wróbel M, Stołtny D, Strojek K. Use of metformin in patients who require intravascular administration of a contrast agent. Endokrynol Pol. 2022;73(6):913-916. PMID: 36519659
citations.BibTeX: @article{36519659, title={Use of metformin in patients who require intravascular administration of a contrast agent.}, author={Rokicka D and Wróbel M and Stołtny D and Strojek K}, journal={Endokrynol Pol}, volume={73}, number={6}, pages={913-916}}

results.title: [Metformin has a positive effect on disorders of carbohydrate metabolism in long-term care with low doses of prednisone].
results.text_hl: [@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has a positive effect on @<m>DISEASE_Carbohydrate_Metabolism_Inborn_Errors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002239 @@@disorders of carbohydrate metabolism@@@ in long-term care with low doses of @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@].
